author: fauly
content:
Hopefully, this is a ui editor that works. 
It seems to! Which is [i]exciting[/i]
[font_size=10]especially if I can preview bbcode as i'm currently doing.[/font_size]
i'm sure that there will end up being some bugs but at least for now what i've added:
[ol] ability to browse existing files with a quick preview, which now I realise I should update to the logPreview scene not just text
 The ability to edit files and view whilst typing
 Saving files! [/ol]
title: A ui editor
